tabData.title: The future of Copilot in LBGâ€‹
tabData.text:
â€˜â€™Copilot, act as a marketing manager and write me a 2 line hook to get colleagues to sign up to a 30 min talk on the future of AI in LBG, make it sound unmissable. I need buzzwords like Copilot, LLMs, AI agents, Copilot studio and power appsâ€˜â€™

ðŸš€ Step into the future of work at LBG â€” Join us for a 30-min power-packed talk on how Copilot Studio and Power Apps are reshaping the way LBG works with AI.  
 Critical Skill : **Artificial Intelligence**
tabData.name: Henry Wharton

tabData.title: How the IDP will drive the success of the future of application development
tabData.text:
How IDP will enable the future of application development by improving the composability of existing applications and designing new applications which are composable by default within the overarching objective of accelerating the Bank's digital business transformation. Additionally, this session will describe how Business Platforms can accelerate development while owning their development experience through IDP's democratized (federated) development, integration and governance tools.  
 Critical Skill : **Solution & Technical Architecture**
tabData.name: Paul Carroll

tabData.title: Transitioning to Engineering Levels
tabData.text:
We are introducing a new framework designed to support career progression within Engineering. Come along to find out more about Engineering Levelsâ€”what they mean for you and your teams, and how they will help us develop and succeed together. This is an exciting change, shaped by feedback from Engineers across our organisation.  
 Critical Skill : **Learning & Talent Development**
tabData.name: Kelly Evans

tabData.title: Internal Developer Platform
tabData.text:
Join us for an rapid tour of our new Internal Developer Platform 

In 25 mins we will bust the myths of What is the IDP ? What is a Golden Path? Then we'll show you how we use the Backstage Portal to deploy an Interstellar Web App Golden Path and build and Deploy it with Harness.  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Dan Davy

tabData.title: GitHub Copilot
tabData.text:
We know what GitHub copilot is, now letâ€™s turn the volume up to 11! 

An adventure on what you can achieve with the tools being implemented by the Engineering Platform.  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineeringâ€‹**
tabData.name: Stuart Fosker

tabData.title: Technology Strategy 3.0: Our vision to be the UKâ€™s Biggest FinTech
tabData.text:
Join us to reveal our latest technology strategy outlining how we Simplify to fix yesterday's complexities, Modernise with the technologies of today, Pioneer by building for tomorrow and Engineering with Excellence by putting the best talent, agile processes and tools at the heart of everything we do.  
 Critical Skill : **Technology Leadershipâ€‹**
tabData.name: Judy Lai & Haris Arif

tabData.title: Sustainability and AI
tabData.text:
Join us for a discussion exploring the powerful correlation between sustainability and artificial intelligence (AI). The session will highlight how these two forces are shaping the future at LBG and across the wider market. Panellists will share insights on the opportunities, challenges, and practical relevance of integrating sustainability principles with AI innovation, both within the organisation and in the external landscape.  
 Critical Skill : **Sustainable Technologies**
tabData.name: Dr Nataliya Tkachenkoâ€‹ & Rohit Dhawan

tabData.title: Beyond Monitoring: Building a Culture of Observabilityâ€‹
tabData.text:
Discover how Lloyds Banking Group is shifting from traditional monitoring to a culture of observability -empowering teams to build resilient platforms, enable service reset, and drive smarter decisions. Attendees will gain practical insights and real examples to champion observability in their own areas.  
 Critical Skill : **SRE & Service Engineering**
tabData.name: Manoj Rana, Gavin Hamilton & Harbinder Panesarâ€‹

tabData.title: What is Site Reliability Engineering?
tabData.text:
Get the latest view on how we are tackling the challenges of running in Cloud with Carol Morris - Head of Public Cloud SRE.  
 Critical Skill : **IT PLatforms & Hosting â€‹**
tabData.name: Carol Morris

tabData.title: Securing Tomorrow: How Insight Tools Are Reinventing Security Culture Across LBGâ€‹
tabData.text:
Explore how the Chief Security Office is transforming Security Insight to influence behaviours and deliver a higher security capability and culture in a growing external threat landscape.  
 Critical Skill : **Information Security**
tabData.name: Christine Wrightâ€‹ & Neil Price

tabData.title: Reimagining HR Support with GenAI: The Story of Prosper
tabData.text:
Join Leah Butler from the Colleague Success team as she takes you behind the scenes of a bold transformation in HR support. Discover how the team built a dynamic new HR knowledge base and launched **Prosper**, a GenAI-powered virtual assistant designed to empower colleagues with instant, intelligent guidance. Whether you're curious about GenAI in HR or looking to drive transformation in your own space, this is a session you wonâ€™t want to miss.   
 Critical Skill : **HR Service Delivery**
tabData.name: Leah Butler

tabData.title: Revolutionising Engineer Onboarding
tabData.text:
A journey into the exciting simplification of our Engineering Onboarding process covering new devices and role based accesses.   
 Critical Skill : **Colleague Experience**
tabData.name: Jessica Huckson

tabData.title: Partnering for Progress: Unlocking shared success with the Launch Innovation Programme
tabData.text:
Curious about how innovation can drive real change in our organisation? Join the Launch Innovation programme intro session to discover how we work with start ups and scale ups to turn bold ideas into impactful solutions. Learn more about the programme and some of the exciting experiments we've been running to shape our customer propositions.   
 Critical Skill : **Creativity & Innovative Thinking**
tabData.name: Alison Dyer-Jones

tabData.title: Building Quantum Capability: Skills, Strategy and the Future of Banking at LBG
tabData.text:
Quantum computing has the power to reshape financial services. But how will it affect you? Join Emerging Technology & Innovation teams Adam Milner and a panel of Quantum Ambassadors, as they share an insider look at how the Quantum is being explored at LBG, how it could revolutionise risk management and what you can do to future-proof your skills.   
 Critical Skill : **Technology Intelligence**
tabData.name: Adam Milner

tabData.title: Serverless Superpowers with Google Cloud Run
tabData.text:
Supercharge your serverless skills in this practical workshop focused on Google Cloud Run. Learn to deploy and scale containerised apps with ease, secure your services, and build reactive systems using Pub/Sub and Cloud Storage triggers. Youâ€™ll also explore traffic splitting, service revisions, and encryption with CMEK. â€‹Ideal for engineers, developers, and platform teams working in cloud-native environmentsâ€”especially those transitioning to GCP or adopting event-driven architectures. Basic GCP knowledge, familiarity with containers, HTTP services, and command-line tools. CI/CD experience is helpful but not required.  

**LBG laptop required** 

 Critical Skill : **IT Platforms & Hosting**
tabData.name: Jack Stuart, Emily Serle & Charlotte Boults

tabData.title: Copilot â€“ Prompt Along sessions
tabData.text:
This energetic, hands-on session helps you get to grips with Copilot through smart prompting. Youâ€™ll learn key frameworks like GCSE (Goal, Context, Source, Expectations), and practise prompts from cake recipes to real business challenges. Bring your laptop, curiosity, and a spirit of collaboration, no Copilot licence needed. Ask questions, share your best prompts, and learn from others in a supportive environment. Boost your productivity, tailor prompts, and ride the innovation wave at LBG. 

**LBG laptop required**

 Critical Skill : **Digital Literacy**
tabData.name: Henry Wharton & Sean Smith

tabData.title: Work smarter to get faster
tabData.text:
Through game-based learning you will develop the skills to better understand how much work you have in progress, how to avoid blockers and improve your speed of delivery. You'll learn how to deliver more without working any harder. 

**LBG laptop required**

 Critical Skill : **Agile Methodology and Tools**
tabData.name: Dee Adam

tabData.title: From Insight to Action: Dynatrace Observability for Service Reset Resilience
tabData.text:
Get hands-on with Dynatrace and learn how to apply observability to your day-to-day work. This session will help you build practical skills to improve platform resilience, support service reset, and strengthen your teamâ€™s observability maturity. 

**LBG laptop required** 

 Critical Skill : **SRE & Service Engineering**

tabData.title: Building and deploying apps with the Internal Developer Platform
tabData.text:
Join us for an immersive hands-on technical workshop where we will guide you through the process of creating an app using our Internal Developer Platform, providing a comprehensive engineer's experience from start to finish. We will provide you with all the necessary access and resources, along with step-by-step guidelines. Our experts will be on hand to assist and answer any questions you may have, ensuring you gain practical, hands-on experience.â€‹Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills, learn from industry experts, and collaborate with fellow engineers.  
**LBG laptop required** 

 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Tony Phillips & Asa Harland
